Title: Standard Fire
reqs: 75% of Units must be either Missile Boat or Sniper
effect: 2 Unit may be given the Sniper ability.

Title: Indirect Fire
minimums: At least 3 Units must possess the Indirect Fire (IF#) ability.
reqs: 75% of Units must be either Missile Boat or Sniper
effect: 2 Unit may be given the Oblique Attacker ability.

Title: Direct Fire
minimums: At least 2 Units must be Size 3 or larger.
reqs: All Units must have a Long Range DMG value >= 2
effect: 2 Unit may be given the Weapon Specialist ability.

Title: Artillery Fire
minimums: At least 2 Units must possess the Artillery (ARTX-#) ability.
effect: 2 Unit may be given the Oblique Artilleryman ability.

Title: Anti-Air Fire
minimums: At least 2 Units must possess the Flak (FLK-#),Autocannon (A\C#/#/#), Artillery (ARTX-#) ability.
or have the Anti-Air Targeting Quirk.
reqs: 75% of Units must be either Missile Boat or Sniper
effect: 2 Unit may be given the Anti-Air Specialist ability.
